definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: What play will be performed tonight at the Palace of Culture?
sentences.chinese: 今晚在文化宫会上演哪个戏目？

sentences.english: Originally Ancestral Temple, People's Cultural Palace is National major cultural relics preservation unit.
sentences.chinese: 劳动人民文化宫原为太庙，为全国重点文物保护单位。

sentences.english: The copper ceiling of the National Culture Palace hall is made by our factory.
sentences.chinese: 这是我厂为民族文化宫大厅制作的铜錾花吊顶。

sentences.english: Of the hostage-taking incident in Moscow's Cultural Palace Theater bearing factory.
sentences.chinese: 发生劫持人质事件的莫斯科的轴承厂文化宫剧院。

definition: Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities

Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
